trans-unit.source: Represents the permissions that can be granted for file access and operations on memory-mapped files.
trans-unit.target: 表示授與檔案存取及作業記憶體對應檔的權限。

trans-unit.source: The MemoryMappedFileSecurity class specifies the access rights for a memory-mapped file and how access attempts are audited.
trans-unit.target: MemoryMappedFileSecurity 類別指定的存取權限的記憶體對應檔，以及如何稽核存取嘗試。

trans-unit.source: This class represents access and audit rights as a set of rules.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會表示為一組規則的存取和稽核 」 權限。

trans-unit.source: The MemoryMappedFileSecurity class is an abstraction of the underlying Microsoft Windows file security system.
trans-unit.target: MemoryMappedFileSecurity 類別是抽象的基礎的 Microsoft Windows 檔案安全性系統。

trans-unit.source: It hides many of the details of DACLs and SACLs.
trans-unit.target: 它會隱藏許多 Dacl Sacl 的詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: Use the MemoryMappedFileSecurity class to retrieve, add, or change the access rules that represent the DACL and SACL of a pipe.
trans-unit.target: 使用 MemoryMappedFileSecurity 類別來擷取、 新增或變更代表 DACL 和 SACL 的管道的存取規則。

trans-unit.source: To apply new or changed access or audit rules to a memory-mapped file, use the <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.SetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要將新的或變更存取權套用稽核規則至記憶體對應檔案，使用<xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.SetAccessControl%2A>方法。</xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.SetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve access or audit rules from an existing file, use the <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.GetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 擷取存取或稽核規則從現有的檔案，請使用<xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.GetAccessControl%2A>方法。</xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.GetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile> methods take a MemoryMappedFileSecurity object as a parameter: - <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateNew%28System.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileOptions%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%29> - <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile%28System.IO.FileStream%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%2CSystem.Boolean%29> - <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.SetAccessControl%28System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%29> - <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateOrOpen%28System.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileOptions%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%29>
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile>方法會採用 MemoryMappedFileSecurity 物件做為參數:- <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateNew%28System.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileOptions%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%29>- <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile%28System.IO.FileStream%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%2CSystem.Boolean%29>- <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.SetAccessControl%28System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%29>- <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateOrOpen%28System.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileOptions%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%29></xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateOrOpen%28System.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileOptions%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%29> </xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.SetAccessControl%28System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%29> </xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile%28System.IO.FileStream%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateNew%28System.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileOptions%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%29> </xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity"></xref>類別。
